name: ZOMBIE SURVIVAL PROJECT BETA
description:
This is my first game it is in development, and I will continue to be working on this for a while. I made this game on scratch you can go to my profile and click to link to start making your own games. There are bugs in the game this is explained in the beginning of the game

Changelog and other thing can be found files will need to be extracted to play yes, this game can be downloaded. THIS IS ONLY AVAILIBLE FOR WINDOWS 

HOW TO PLAY

wasd to move and use your mouse to shoot bullets your goal is just to survive as long as you can more features will be coming soon and click play button to play press enter to pause the game. PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF THERE IS BUGS SO I CAN FIX THEM

Credits 

credits will be in the game later but for now i just have to say I created this game by myself and used the website  https://scratch.mit.edu go here and start to create games.Thank you to other scratchers who inspired me to create this game.
